alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:13PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...An isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado through 745 PM MDT... At 711 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an isolated thunderstorm 8 miles west of Cheyenne Wells, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. Gusty winds may occur in advance of this storm, with little or no rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cheyenne Wells around 725 PM MDT. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 142 and 168. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
